author: ShaydeNofziger
body:
# PR Summary

Various improvements to the contributor's guide, including grammar fixes, making common links for easier updating, and fix for a broken link to VS Code editor documentation.

It appears the link to the VS Code markdown documentation file no longer exists. I thought it best to link directly to Microsoft Docs's [Editing with VSCode](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/scripting/components/vscode/using-vscode?view=powershell-7#editing-with-vscode) section.

comments.author: PoshChan
comments.body: @TravisEz13, this is the reminder you requested 1 hour ago

title: Improvements to the contribution guide
